results.title: Effect of indomethacin on the antihypertensive efficacy of valsartan and lisinopril: a multicentre study.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To compare the effect on antihypertensive efficacy produced by the addition of @CHEMICAL_Indomethacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007213 @@@indomethacin@@@ to the @GENE_AGT @GENE_183 @@@angiotensin II@@@ (@GENE_AGT @GENE_183 @@@Ang II@@@) antagonist, @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@, or to the @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@angiotensin-converting enzyme@@@ inhibitor, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with chronic @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@.

citations.NLM: Fogari R, Zoppi A, Carretta R, Veglio F, Salvetti A, Italian Collaborative Study Group. Effect of indomethacin on the antihypertensive efficacy of valsartan and lisinopril: a multicentre study. J Hypertens. 2002 May;20(5):1007-14. PMID: 12011663
citations.BibTeX: @article{12011663, title={Effect of indomethacin on the antihypertensive efficacy of valsartan and lisinopril: a multicentre study.}, author={Fogari R and Zoppi A and Carretta R and Veglio F and Salvetti A and Italian Collaborative Study Group}, journal={J Hypertens}, volume={20}, number={5}, pages={1007-14}}

results.title: Potential pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction between concomitantly administered lisinopril and diclofenac sodium: a call for appropriate management in hypertensive osteoarthritic patients.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Post-screening and on inclusion, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were put on a 2-week washout period and then randomly assigned to either only @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 10 mg or combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 10 mg and @CHEMICAL_Diclofenac @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004008 @@@diclofenac sodium@@@ 100 mg treatments for 8-12 weeks in diseased states of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Osteoarthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010003 @@@osteoarthritis@@@ with or without @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@.

citations.NLM: Goswami SK, Jain S, Chudasama H, Santani D. Potential pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction between concomitantly administered lisinopril and diclofenac sodium: a call for appropriate management in hypertensive osteoarthritic patients. Drug Metabol Drug Interact. 2011;26(3):127-37. PMID: 21980964
citations.BibTeX: @article{21980964, title={Potential pharmacodynamic drug-drug interaction between concomitantly administered lisinopril and diclofenac sodium: a call for appropriate management in hypertensive osteoarthritic patients.}, author={Goswami SK and Jain S and Chudasama H and Santani D}, journal={Drug Metabol Drug Interact}, volume={26}, number={3}, pages={127-37}}
